abstract: Energy Sec Ernest J Moniz and Ali Akbar Salehi, head of Iran's nuclear program, are No 2 negotiators in talks about Iran's nuclear program, sign that discussions have progressed to technical issues; Moniz must ensure that Iran's nuclear infrastructure is scaled back to point at which it will be incapable of producing raw material for nuclear weapon in less than year.
lead_paragraph: Forty years after they both attended M.I.T., the nuclear scientists Ernest J. Moniz and Ali Akbar Salehi have emerged as the No. 2 negotiators on Iran’s nuclear program.

headline.main: No. 2 Negotiators in Iran Talks Argue Physics Behind Politics
headline.print_headline: No. 2 Negotiators in Iran Talks Argue Physics Behind Politics

snippet: Forty years after they both attended M.I.T., the nuclear scientists Ernest J. Moniz and Ali Akbar Salehi have emerged as the No. 2 negotiators on Iran’s nuclear program.
